data.text:
Whoo! Finally, finally, finally, finally! 
It's finally starting!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
That is correct! The curtains covering our commemoration of the 
WINNING DREAM STAGE are finally…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
The endless wasteland… filled with untouched gold 
veins and mysterious ancient ruins! Mac-chan, take 
my hand! Let's embark on a new adventure!!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
What are you trying to do!? We are performing a L-I-V-E concert! 
Do you understand? A live concert!!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Ahaha, Golshi is saying crazy things again. But I guess it's 
McQueen's fault for always believing what she says… Wait, hmm?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text: Hello, Spe-chan?
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
Yes!? My name is Special Week 
and I will be singing!?
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
…Spe-chan, it's not your turn yet, you know? 
You seem… really nervous.
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Auu… Y-Yes, just a little… 
Wait no, I'm really nervous!!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Everyone's been working really hard to make sure that everything 
goes well today… I just don't want to ruin it…!!
data.name: Special Week

data.text: Yuh stupid idjit!!
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
Nuwa! Spe, you're always lookin back!! You need to start facin' 
your toes forward, doncha think!?
data.name: Gold Ship

data.text:
E-Eh!? M-My toes…? 
But they're always facing forward!?
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
Err, well… While I may not fully understand what 
Goldship-san is saying, it still makes se-… or 
rather, it still makes about 20% sense.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
To commemorate something is to not only remember what happened in 
the past, but also to carve out a new future with it.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

data.text:
Well, in short, it's not about what we've done so far, it's about 
what we're going to do from now on. That's what she meant♪
data.name: Tokai Teio

data.text:
You can do it, Spe-chan. 
Just remember…
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
Since the beginning, we've been running forward with all our 
heart… day after day, rain or shine, right?
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text: Don't look back… Just keep moving forward. Forward…!
data.name: Special Week

data.text:
We will convey our hopes 
and dreams with our song…!
data.name: Special Week
